## Installation

You can install the development version of `{exploreHTP}` like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("AparicioJohan/exploreHTP")
```

## Run

You can launch the application by running:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(exploreHTP)
run_app()
```
